alert.note: Alert for Pecos; Terrell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 4:25PM CDT until October 04 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Pecos County in southwestern Texas... Northeastern Terrell County in southwestern Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 425 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 25 miles south of McCamey, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sheffield and Terrell County Gas Plant. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 298 and 327. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
